title: Watch Shashi Tharoor's critique of Interim Budget- 'No Data Available (NDA) to New meaning of GDP'
selftext: The kind of people we need in parliament.
comments: Could someone intelligent please explain, why isn’t he the face of congress?
Unappealing to the masses , 80% people won't understand what he speaks because they aren't on the level of education.
It's not like he can't speak hindi
